original_title: Queen: Live at Earl's Court Arena
overview: Concert  by Queen, played live at Earl's Court, London on June 6th, 1977. Although the concert was planned to be released on video it only can be found on bootlegged dvd's.  Procession  Tie Your Mother Down  Ogre Battle  White Queen (As It Began)  Somebody to Love  Killer Queen  Good Old-Fashioned Lover Boy  The Millionaire Waltz  You're My Best Friend  Bring Back That Leroy Brown  Death on Two Legs (Dedicated toâ€¦)  Doing All Right  Brighton Rock  '39  You Take My Breath Away  White Man  The Prophet's Song  Bohemian Rhapsody  Keep Yourself Alive  Stone Cold Crazy  In the Lap of the Gods... Revisited  Now I'm Here  Liar  Lucille  Jailhouse Rock  Saturday Night's Alright for Fighting  God Save the Queen
tagline: In Concert at Earl's Court 6th of June, 1977
title: Queen: Live at Earl's Court Arena
